title: CMU License
description: Similiar to MIT license. A short, permissive software license. Basically, you can do whatever you want as long as you do not charge a fee.

must.title: Commercial Use
must.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

must.title: Include Copyright
must.description: Describes whether the original copyright must be retained.

must.title: Include License
must.description: Including the full text of license in modified software.

cannot.title: Hold Liable
cannot.description: Describes the warranty and if the software/license owner can be charged for damages.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Private Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use/modify software freely without distributing it.

can.title: Sublicense
can.description: Describes the ability for you to grant/extend a license to the software.

fulltext:

Permission to use, copy, modify and distribute this software and its documentation for any purpose and without fee is hereby granted, provided that the above copyright notice appears in all copies and that both that copyright notice and this permission notice appear in supporting documentation, and that the name of CMU and The Regents of the University of California not be used in advertising or publicity pertaining to distribution of the software without specific written permission.

CMU AND THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS SOFTWARE, INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS. IN NO EVENT SHALL CMU OR THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM THE LOSS OF USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE OR OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS SOFTWARE.
